name: Postal Panic
description:
Aww nuts, your postal van crashed into a bomb van and now everything's all over the place. You're going to have to collect every piece of mail while trying not to get hit by the bombs.

This predicament also has your confidence shaken and you seem to adhere to the 3-strikes rule when it comes to missing a piece of mail.

To make matters more strange, you got this weird old guy thinking your life is a game and his strange looking grandson narrating! You don't get paid enough for this.

CONTROLS:

TO START - Press Any Key

MOVEMENT - Arrow Keys

TO RESTART - Space Bar

Postal Panic is a submission for LowRezJam 2016.

It was developed by a group of friends collectively known as OptionSelect.

  • Programming by Mert "Matt" Talubas
  • Art & Voices by David "Azroix" Bettencourt
  • Sounds, Playtesting & Concept Contributions by Carvey "grinningblue" Hor, Rizwan "riz0ne" Ghani and William "Bawk" Ng
  • Music by MoppySound for free via the Unity Asset Store
  • Sounds by Little Robot Sound Factory & Treasure Sounds for free via the Unity Asset Store

Comments and Feedback welcome. This is our 1st game as a group, let us know what you think and what we can do to improve.
